body_html:
For some terrible reason, local variables are not considered part of "all"
:(

We are in the process of renaming "all" to somethong else less confusing,
since models would break if we made "all" include local variables. It's a
mess.

On Wed, Aug 17, 2016, 11:00 AM Mohammed AlQuraishi notifications@github.com
wrote:

I had a similar problem and this fixes it for me too. I'm a bit puzzled
though, as I had previously called
tf.initialize_all_variables().run(session=sess) but that did not work on
its own. I actually had to call initialize_local_variables() as well.
Shouldn't the former subsume the latter?

—

body:
For some terrible reason, local variables are not considered part of "all"
:(

We are in the process of renaming "all" to somethong else less confusing,
since models would break if we made "all" include local variables. It's a
mess.

On Wed, Aug 17, 2016, 11:00 AM Mohammed AlQuraishi notifications@github.com
wrote:

> I had a similar problem and this fixes it for me too. I'm a bit puzzled
> though, as I had previously called
> tf.initialize_all_variables().run(session=sess) but that did not work on
> its own. I actually had to call initialize_local_variables() as well.
> Shouldn't the former subsume the latter?
>
